    • Method Detail

      • nextRetry

        public long nextRetry(TransactionFailureException reason,
             int failureCount)
        Description copied from interface: RetryStrategy
        Returns the number of milliseconds to wait before retrying the operation.
        Specified by:
        nextRetry in interface RetryStrategy
        Parameters:
        reason - Reason for transaction failure.
        failureCount - Number of times that the request has been failed.
        Returns:
        Number of milliseconds to wait before retrying the operation. Returning 0 means retry it immediately, while negative means abort the operation.
